titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude strike benefits from gross income.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude strike benefits from gross income.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill excludes from gross income, for income tax purposes, compensation paid to a labor union worker if such compensation is a replacement for wages not received by such worker due to a labor dispute (i.e., strike).
